scriptComment.dev: Starts the development server. Runs on http://localhost:3000 by default.
scriptComment.build: Builds the app for production. Outputs to the dist/ directory.
scriptComment.preview: Preview the production build locally. Runs on http://localhost:5000 by default.
scriptComment.pre-commit: Runs before a commit is made.
scriptComment.test: Runs the test suite. Runs all tests once.
scriptComment.test:watch: Runs the test suite in watch mode. Runs tests when files change.
scriptComment.test:coverage: Runs the test suite with coverage. Outputs a coverage report to the console.
